data.actual_result: The mention modal doesnt load their new name and profile picture, so the mention doesnt work
data.expected_result: You should be able to properly mention them and load their pfp/name
data.short_description: Mention Modal doesnt load a users new profile picture or name
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a user change their name and profile picture - **Dont** have them send a new message - Try to mention them
